mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_train_plan ORDER BY id DESC limit #{start},#{pageSize}
mapper.update: update tb_train_plan set title = #{title},content = #{content},people_num = #{peopleNum},start_time = #{startTime},end_time = #{endTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select date(c.start_time) as one_day,count(c.id) count_num from tb_train_plan c where c.start_time between date_format(#{startDate},'%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{endDate},'%Y%m%d') group by one_day order by one_day asc ;

select date(c.start_time) as one_day,count(a.staff_id) peo_num from tb_train_plan c left join tb_train_staff_relation a on c.id=a.train_plan_id where c.start_time between date_format(#{startDate},'%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{endDate},'%Y%m%d') group by one_day order by one_day asc;

select s.id id, s.user_name user_name from tb_staff s left join (select s.* from tb_staff s left join tb_train_staff_relation tsr on tsr.staff_id = s.id left join tb_train_plan tp on tp.id = tsr.train_plan_id where tsr.train_plan_id = #{id}) t on s.id = t.id where s.company_id =#{companyId} and t.id is null
select COUNT(train_plan_id) from tb_train_staff_relation where train_plan_id =#{id}
